title: Git and GitHub: A Hands-on Guide
subtitle: Practical Version Control for Your Missing Semester
description: A hands-on, beginner-friendly course on Git and GitHub tailored for 1st and 2nd year students of RUET. Inspired by MIT's Missing Semester, this series covers version control fundamentals, GitHub workflows, Markdown, branching, and open-source collaboration â€” all through real projects like building a Tic-Tac-Toe game.
